 is a Japanese horror novel by Koji Suzuki, first published in 1991, and set in
 modern-day Japan. It was the basis for a film of the same name (1998's
 ''Ring''), and two remakes: a Korean version ([[The Ring Virus]]) and an
 American version ([[The Ring (2002 film)|The Ring]]).
